mapper.select: SELECT (select count(_tu.id) from top_user _tu where _tu.create_time BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}) as todayCount, (select count(_tu.id) from top_user _tu where _tu.create_time BETWEEN #{yesterdayStart} and #{yesterdayEnd}) as yesterdayCount FROM DUAL

SELECT tt.symbol, IFNULL(sum(IF(tt.type = 'Recharge', tt.token_amount, 0)), 0) as deposit, IFNULL(sum(IF(tt.type = 'Withdraw', tt.token_amount, 0)), 0) as withdraw FROM top_transaction tt WHERE tt.is_confirm = 1 AND tt.create_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY tt.symbol
